REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2732 reute b f BC-******NASDAQ-SHORT-IN 03-24 0052

TEXT.TITLE: NASDAQ SHORT INTEREST IN MARCH FALLS
TEXT.BODY:
NASDAQ said short interest as of mid-march totaled 184.9 mln shares compared to 215.7 mln shares for the month of February. NASDAQ said the mid-March figures are based on 3,983 securities and the February figures are based on 3,842 securities.
Reuter
